column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////As for the food. It was mouth-watering. The steak (aged rib-eye) was cooked perfectly (we shared it)
column2: the sides (truffle mac n' cheese and mashed potatoes) complimented each other and the steak
column3: and the appetiser was perfect for two. The corkage fee is so clever and brilliant (bring your own bottle and share a small glass with another patron/ess) that we brought two bottles. And the desserts (chocolate tart and ice cream) put us over the edge directly into food heaven.
